Trade/Device Name(s): LIAISON® XL 1,25 Dihydroxyvitamin D Control Set
LIAISON® XL 1,25 Dihydroxyvitamin D Calibration Verifiers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LIAISON XL 1,25 Dihydroxyvitamin D CLIA assay, controls, and calibration verifiers for quantitative determination of 1,25 dihydroxyvitamin D on LIAISON XL Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of 1,25 dihydroxyvitamin D in serum, EDTA and lithium heparin plasma in adults, to assess vitamin D sufficiency; assay controls and calibration verifiers intended for monitoring assay performance and verifying calibration range on LIAISON XL Analyzer
